snippet.title: Elements - Is Live on Kickstarter!
snippet.description:
Elements is live on Kickstarter! https://tinyurl.com/elementskickstarter

Across Elemythia, a vast, verdant land of sword, sorcery, and secrets, eight enchanted Elemental Stones hold the key to saving Nyah and Beckett’s home. Accept your calling as either sibling, playing solo or drop-in co-op. Reclaim the eight Elemental Stones—and their powers of Light, Dark, Fire, Water, Ice, Nature, Earth, and Air.

We have partnered with Apogee Entertainment. They have made so many games I grew up playing, it is really a full-circle moment. I am very excited about the future of Elements.

Another big announcement is that Patricia Summerset will be voicing one of the lead characters, Nyah. Patricia is the actress behind Rainbow Six: Siege (Ash), Assassin’s Creed: Syndicate (Galina), and the beloved Princess Zelda in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild and Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity. It's amazing to have her on the team.

Come join our discord https://discord.gg/psFZzqgB6r to give me feedback on how to make the game great.

Wishlist Elements here https://store.steampowered.com/app/1468110/Elements/
